La double authentification (2FA) renforc: Two factor authentication (2FA) strengthens access security by requiring two methods (also referred to as factors) to verify your identity. Two factor authentication protects against phishing, social engineering and password brute force attacks and secures your logins from attackers exploiting weak or stolen credentials.

DediKam est une association, indépendant: Dedikam is an independant, ad-free, 100% transparent, non-lucrative association. We offer a diverse panel of collaborative tools for all kind of users, be they private individuals or professionnals
Avec le service mutualisé, nous vous pro: With shared hosting services, we can offer you collaborative and web tools to manage your data as you see fit
Nous utilisons des outils 100% logiciel: We're using 100% free software, which are able to answer to and adapt to our customers' needs
Nextcloud est un logiciel libre offrant: Nextcloud is a free software offering an advanced file-sharing platform which lets you in total control of your file sharing parameters. It presents itself as an alternative to Google Docs.
Pydio est un logiciel libre offrant une: Pydio is a free software offering a storage-service and file-sharing platform. It too presents itself as an alternative to Dropbox.
Testez nos services mutualisés pendant 3: Try our shared or dedicated services during a 30-day period with
Nous vous proposons une solution dédiée: We can offer you a dedicated plan (Nextcloud, Pydio or Seafile) hosted on VPS-type servers
A la différence du service mutualisé, le: Contrary to shared hosting services, dedicated hosting service comes with a significative performance gain, since you are alone on the server.
Cela permet d'exploiter à 100% les resso: It allows you to use 100% of the hardware's capacity and gives you a total freedom for managing your NextCloud/Pydio/Seafile instance. Increased availability for your company data.

Identifiez vos besoins en matière de sau: Identify your needs concerning data sharing or backup and, if you need to, contact us by mail or telephone so we can assist you and offer you the best solution regarding your needs.
WebDAV est un protocole de longue date q: WEBDAV is an old-seasoned protocol allowing web servers to act as hosting servers, and thus taking care of collaborative creation of web content. While its bested by more modern strategies, it's still a reliable tool used by many servers, clients and applications.
L’accès SSH vous permet d’accéder à une: SSH access allows you to access a SSH console directly linked to your Dedikam account through a fully crypted and secure connexion. Authentication to this console can be done with a login/password pair or with a private key/public key pair.
Le disque ISCSI fonctionne et se comport: ISCSI disk works and acts the same way a local hard drive does : the goal of ISCSI is to have one or many hard drives on one's computer (or server) and to have the illusion they're physically connected via the motherboard. In reality, they're virtual hard drives hosted in a redudant, safe and performant infrastructure. Thus, it allows to overcome the hardware failures a machine or hard drive can experience.
Le SFTP est un protocole de communicatio: SFTP is a communication protocol taking place above SSH to remotely transfer and manage files. With SFTP, you can upload and download files and folders, and resume transfers even after interrupting them or disconnecting. You can also overwrite files without modifying the download key. Secure and crypted connexion.
L’option CIFS est un protocole TCP/IP ré: CIFS is a network TCP/IP protocol allowing to share resources and to access files using millions of computers at the same time. Users with different platforms and computers can share files without installing new software. With CFTS, modifications added to a file are simultaneously saved client-side and server-side.
Synchronise et transfert uniquement les: Synchronizes and transfers solely new files or edited files. Rsync especially allows to upload parts of a file. What it means, is that if you're working on a 300Mo file but you change only its end, Rsync will compute and send the difference only. It's thus way faster than using SFTP, which will transfer the whole file.
Le FTP/FTPS est un protocole de communic: FTP/FTPS is a communication protocol taking place above SSH to remotely transfer and manage files. With FTP/FTPS, you can upload and download files and folders, and resume transfers even after interrupting them or disconnecting. You can also overwrite files without modifying the download key. Secure and crypted connexion.
Toutes vos données fragmentées, copiées: All of your data fragmented, copied and dispatched on different servers/Datacenters based on chosen availability level.
